attributes.action: Give all blind people the right to learn Braille
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many blind people are being denied this essential skill because of lack of funding, ressources, lack of knowlege of the LEA and lack of braille teachers.
Braille needs to be promoted and is essential for blind people to enjoy the right to read!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Give all blind people the right to learn Braille."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15236.asp
